game.name: Refate: Echoes of Desire
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Wake up with amnesia in Tokyo, caught between the Yakuza and police. Romance 8 unique beauties: cop, ninja, boss, izakaya owner, heiress, college girl, teacher, model. Uncover your true identity—host, agent, assassin, or crime lord? Shape your destiny and find true love.
